content: on side otherwise place the other eye to the other approx round 3 to 7 approx side between round 9 and 10 approx 2 stitches away -shape the ears so they are nice and tall like bat from the nose ears -line up the patch/es so they are even and pin it -sew the ears in place in place if you have two patches there is a space of approx 2 stitches between them -i attach the patches with a whip stitch but you ​ can attach them however you prefer -with the black cotton sew the nose -with white yarn sew small lines to the outer sides of the eyes santa hat continue with the head staring with moonstone/white yarn then change to keep adding stuffing as you go yellow jasper/gold round 17 single_crochet x2 decrease x6 18 starting with the rim chain 42 ​ round 18 single_crochet decrease x6 12 round 1 work your first stitch into the first chain round 19 decrease x6 6 create a loop single_crochet x42 42 fasten_off close the hole and weave in tail round 2 to 3 single_crochet x42 42 now fold the rim wrong sides together for the next round we are going to work through the top of round 3 and also the starting chain round 4 single_crochet x42 42 round 5 change to yellow jasper yarn single_crochet x42 42 ​ ​ round 6 single_crochet x9 chain x9 skip 9 single_crochet x6 chain x9 skip 9 single_crochet x9 42 ears x2 round 7 single_crochet x42 42 with either black onyx/black or moonstone/white round 8 single_crochet x5 decrease x6 36 yarn round 9 single_crochet x36 36 round 1 working in a magic_ring single_crochet x6 6 round 10 single_crochet x4 decrease x6 30 round 2 fasten_off leaving a yarn tail round 19 single_crochet x9 9 the ears are not stuffed round 20 single_crochet decrease x3 6 fasten_off close hole and weave in tails -pin the ears to the head if you have eye patches curve the ears around the top @belleandgracehmc free pattern 3 ​ hat ball with moonstone/white yarn round 1 working in a magic_ring single_crochet x6 6 round 2 increase x6 12 round 3 to 4 single_crochet x12 12 add a little stuffing round 5 decrease x6 6 fasten_off leaving a yarn tail sew the ball to the tip of the hat collar working with yellow jasper/gold start with a long
